lines.text: What time would you say it is?
Say it's about 3 o'clock Earth time here.
'Cept that we don't know how many hours are in the daily cycle here. You know this place could move around faster than our Earth!
Well let's figure it for 3 o'clock anyway! That gives us 3 or 4 hours before dark.

[after detonating an atomic bomb and watching it annihilate much of Planet Nova]
Well, we've done it.
I brought the atom bomb; I think it's a good time to use it!

On April 23rd, the word to start comes from Washington. Underneathly, our finest research laboratories change over to this all important project, the building of a passenger carrying rocketship. Every security measure is taken. Test upon test must be made to develop, improve, create, evolve.
Look, let's get out of here and get back to the ship. I'm scared to death and I don't mind admitting it.
Why, am I glad you're back. Did you have a good trip?
You know, I think they all read too much science fiction. You know, they probably thought we'd meet some kind of super race up here or something.
